title: House of the Small Fountain
description: A Samnite-type house located on the Via di Mercurio (VI, 8, 23). The house derives its conventional name from a mosaic fountain located at the rear of the peristyle.
names: Casa della piccola fontana a musaico
Casa della seconda fontana di mosaico

properties.description: Representative location based on an OpenStreetMap Way that traces the geometry of the perimeter of the building's extant remains.
properties.title: OSM location of so-called "Casa della fontana piccola"
